nodes.text: Generate wind was a Ta-Ree spell capable of being wielded by Ascendants on the planet Kathol. The spell allowed the caster to generate gusts of wind up to the strength of a strong gale depending on their proficiency.

Applications of the power included generating small clouds of dust to hide in, or to obscure the vision of an enemy. More powerful uses could knock a target to the ground. Ascendants who wished to cast the generate wind spell were required to know the detect life and sense life spells.
